# Architecture Guidance

> Architecture guidance and patterns for .NET applications. Covers microservices, cloud-native development, Blazor migration from Web Forms, .NET MAUI, and modern web applications on Azure.

## Topic Indices

- [Blazor for Web Forms Developers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/blazor-for-web-forms-developers/llms.txt): 15 topics; Migrate Web Forms to Blazor components and WebAssembly.
- [Cloud-Native Apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/cloud-native/llms.txt): 44 topics; Containers, microservices, serverless, and Kubernetes on Azure.
- [.NET MAUI Patterns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/maui/llms.txt): 14 topics; MVVM, DI, and enterprise patterns for .NET MAUI apps.
- [Microservices Architecture](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/microservices/llms.txt): 2 topics, 74 in tree; Microservices with Docker, DDD, and event-driven patterns.
- [Modern Web Apps on Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/architecture/modern-web-apps-azure/llms.txt): 11 topics; ASP.NET Core web apps with clean architecture on Azure.
